definition: Tesla (unit)/Nikola Tesla (1856-1943), Serbian inventor and engineer
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: It isn't the first time that a hedge fund short-seller has publicly attacked Tesla recently.
sentences.chinese: 近來，已經有不只一位對沖基金經理公開看空特斯拉。

sentences.english: There are guesses, that Tesla scooped energy for the devices from an aether.
sentences.chinese: 他們說，特斯拉用裝置從以太中汲取能量。
尼古拉特斯拉發明了交流電。

sentences.english: What enemies pursue Tesla and Helen into the catacombs beneath Rome?
sentences.chinese: 在羅馬底下的地下墓穴裏追殺特斯拉和海倫的敵人是？

sentences.english: Below you see a small exposition of Tesla Coil spark pictures.
sentences.chinese: 下面你看到特斯拉線圈火花圖片小的闡述。

sentences.english: What happened to this anti-gravity craft of Tesla's?
sentences.chinese: 對特斯拉的反重力飛行器發生了什麼事？

sentences.english: Tesla's aether is analogous to the classical aether "gas" theory.
sentences.chinese: 特斯拉旳以太是類似於古典旳以太“氣體”理論。

sentences.english: Tesla electromagnetics are composed of potentials and their corresponding motion.
sentences.chinese: 特斯拉的電磁學是由勢能組成，它們相當於運動。

sentences.english: Tesla cars were first offered for sale in two thousand eight.
sentences.chinese: 特斯拉汽車首次推出發售在二00八年。

sentences.english: Of course, Ives is not alone in believing Tesla is valuable.
sentences.chinese: 當然，相信特斯拉很有價值的不只艾夫斯一人。

sentences.english: Tesla is unlikely to become a major car company.
sentences.chinese: 特斯拉不太可能成爲一家主流汽車公司。

sentences.english: She said Tesla was saddened to learn of the death of Mr.
sentences.chinese: 喬治森表示，得知高雅寧的死訊，特斯拉感到悲傷。

sentences.english: To Tesla, sefl-driving/auto pilot is the same as assisted driving.
sentences.chinese: 對特斯拉來說，自動駕駛就是協助駕駛。

sentences.english: The company targets the niche consumers who want luxury electric vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 特斯拉的目標客戶是想買豪華電動汽車的小衆消費者。

definition: Elon Musk (1971-), business magnate and co-founder of Tesla Motors
Elon Musk (1971-), founder and CEO of SpaceX, co-founder and CEO of Tesla Motors
Elon Musk (1971-), founder and CEO of SpaceX, co-founder and CEO of Tesla Motors
Faraday (name)/Michael Faraday (1791-1867), British experimental physicist prominent in the development of electricity

pinyin: Tong1 yong4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1

definition: Toyota or Toyoda (name)/Toyota, Japanese car make
Google, Internet company and search engine
